detectors.description:
SimpleSell.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleSell.sol#70-75) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleSell.sol#72)

detectors.description:
SimpleSell.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleSell.sol#77-83) can write the state variable array at will

	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleSell.sol#80)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:

	- SimpleSell.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleSell.sol#52-54)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleSell.sol#6)
	- SimpleSell.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleSell.sol#56-58)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleSell.sol#7)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- SimpleSell.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleSell.sol#70-75)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleSell.sol#9)
	- SimpleSell.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleSell.sol#64-68)
